string-array.name: introduction_strings
string-array.item:
Before designing this app 
we asked ourselves: 
what do people want? 
 
 
 
The guesses were many and none. 
 
 
 
But to be honest, people want happiness.

This app doesn’t give you happiness. 
But it could help you gain it from inside 
your inner self, situation, fresh look, 
occasionally, or some other way. 
 
 
 
 
You might doubt it altogether. 
You might be skeptical. 
 
 
Sure. 
 
 
But this game is without loss. 
You only win.

This introduction you can skip later. 
The app gives some therapeutic suggestions 
and mind-oriented strategies, such as 
lateral thinking technique, which allows you 
to change focus of an issue and solve it. 
It will also contains therapeutic and creative 
advices which should be a good relaxaction 
and practice. 
 
It might navigate you through some 
yes-no options in future. 
 
 
But first, 
 
Are you happy?

string-array.name: button_entirely_happy_strings
string-array.item:
Well done! 
You are indeed a rare individual. 
 
 
And if you are, 
Our task is to make you prolong this state 
 
To make happiness last 
To make it expand 
 
Till forever

The author of this application was entirely happy 
Also 
And in that state one thing mattered 
To make others happy and prosper 
 
 
Our strategy will now focus on expanding 
And sharing

The idea of this app is simple: 
There will be random cards with small, 
Magic, sometimes absurd but clever 
Advices: things to be done 
Which fit your current state. 
 
You should not take another card 
Before finishing current. 
You must do them. 
Or at least most of them 
 
 
 
You may not. 
But there wouldn’t be any profit

The cards are very special 
They are psychologically prepared 
And have propositions 
Which might seem odd sometimes 
 
The lateral thinking is a way of expanding 
Your inner resources at problem solving 
By focusing on something, which is related 
To the task, but indirectly 
 
It should work like “Eureka!” 
 
And in the end 
It works exactly that way

string-array.name: button_mostly_happy_strings
string-array.item:
Good 
Your state 
Is a golden standard of wellness 
A very essence of norm 
In a normal world 
 
People should be mostly happy 
And extend happiness

And our world is complex 
So we must be elegant 
And creative 
To make our life better 
And"/"or to prolong its goodness

We will try to see which are 
The strongest reasons 
For your happiness 
And reinforce them. 
 
We will try to figure the weakest spots, 
The disturbances 
And revert them 
 
Our strategy here is a joyful 
And interesting journey 
To sub-consciousness. 
 
Pretend it is game, 
Which it is

The idea of this app is simple: 
There will be random cards with small, 
Magic, sometimes absurd but clever 
Advices: things to be done 
Which fit your current state. 
 
You should not take another card 
Before finishing current. 
You must do them. 
Or at least most of them 
 
 
 
You may not. 
But there wouldn’t be any profit

The cards are very special 
They are psychologically prepared 
And have propositions 
Which might seem odd sometimes 
 
The lateral thinking is a way of expanding 
Your inner resources at problem solving 
By focusing on something, which is related 
To the task, but indirectly 
 
It should work like “Eureka!” 
 
And in the end 
It works exactly that way

string-array.name: button_currently_happy_strings
string-array.item:
Congratulations! : ) 
This application likes you happy 
Most of all 
 
If you are happy now 
It is easier to continue 
For many days and more 
 
 
Yet 
We find this "currently" 
Very fragile

We will focus on enhancing 
This delicate and admirable state 
Our strategy will focus on reinforcement 
 
 
To achieve this, we will try to see 
Which factors might be somehow disturbing 
Or distracting in future 
In order to prevent them 
 
If there are none 
It is even better

The idea of this app is simple: 
There will be random cards with small, 
Magic, sometimes absurd but clever 
Advices: things to be done 
Which fit your current state. 
 
You should not take another card 
Before finishing current. 
You must do them.

It works exactly that way

string-array.name: button_mostly_unhappy_strings
string-array.item:
You are not alone. 
Unfortunately, very many are 
In the same situation 
 
Fortunately, 
The troubles are same. 
So as the solutions 
 
Even very sick and tired people 
Can easily recover and rise 
Even if there are strong reasons 
For unhappiness

We will focus on the main reason why 
There is such a state 
 
There might be plenty 
Then we shall take them one by one 
 
 
Our strategy will be reason-oriented. 
We might not solve it, 
But we might help it to dissolve 
Hopefully, at a great extent

\(perhaps, you've already read it\) 
The idea of this app is simple: 
There will be random cards with small, 
Magic, sometimes absurd but clever 
Advices: things to be done 
Which fit your current state. 
 
You should not take another card 
Before finishing current. 
You must do them. 
Or at least most of them 
 
 
 
You may not. 
But there wouldn't be any profit

The cards are very special 
They are psychologically prepared 
And have propositions 
Which might seem odd sometimes 
 
The lateral thinking is a way of expanding 
Your inner resources at problem solving 
By focusing on something, which is related 
To the task, but indirectly 
 
It should work like “Eureka!” 
 
And in the end 
It works exactly that way
So let\'s give it a try

string-array.name: button_helpme_strings
string-array.item:
If it is that bad 
And that honestly serious 
We humbly advice you 
To call a psychologist 
 
No, the app is not ending 
We got some strategies for you right away 
But one of them is 
To call a specialist 
 
And to do it now

Why? 
It just helps. 
Almost every cases are curable 
So please 
Call 
 
And here we will focus on a heavy support 
Without reasons 
 
We don’t need to dig in the reasons 
If the case is depression 
We need to be able to ask for help 
 
Just that easy, yes 
And it will start to be better
